Sentencas: A facile and environment-friendly method, the so-called vertical deposition (abbreviated as VD) method, is used to prepare thin yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) films (<= 5 mu m) for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: A facile and environment-friendly method to fabricate thin electrolyte films for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The YSZ films are self-assembled by VD process based on capillary force.
Titulo: A facile and environment-friendly method to fabricate thin electrolyte films for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The influence of experimental conditions (e. g. concentration of YSZ dispersion, deposition times, and sintering procedure) on the morphology of the films produced and thereby on the performance of SOFC devices is investigated.
Titulo: A facile and environment-friendly method to fabricate thin electrolyte films for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The single cell utilizing a 5 mu m dense YSZ film as solid electrolyte achieves a high open circuit voltage of 1.05V which remains stable at 700 degrees C for 4 h. The peak power density is 0.4 W cm(-2) at 800 degrees C for the phase inversion anode-supported fuel cell composed of an YSZ electrolyte film of 5 mu
Titulo: A facile and environment-friendly method to fabricate thin electrolyte films for solid oxide fuel cells
A facile and environment-friendly method to fabricate thin electrolyte films for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The VD method developed herein is promising for preparing ultra-thin electrolyte films for SOFCs.
Titulo: A facile and environment-friendly method to fabricate thin electrolyte films for solid oxide fuel cells
